review:
Dr. Madhushree is one of the best gynaecologist, we have met till date. Its rare to come across a professional and gem of a person like her.
Throughout my pregnancy doctor kept me so comfortable and with her consultation my pregnancy and delivery was safe and smooth. 
I will definitely recommend you to visit Dr. Madhushree incase you are looking for a ***** gynaecologist in India. We are glad to know her.
Ila Moza
